writeUpList.title: Running postgres in docker for dev environments.
writeUpList.note: Setting up postgres database for your day today dev activities is an easy task, you just need to download the installer and install it.In this blog I am going to describe a much simpler approach for postgres  database setup in your local machine using docker

writeUpList.title: Sorting in Java 8
writeUpList.note:
Sorting is about ordering a list of object and we do this quite often. In fact, this is one of the fundamental problems we all should aware about as a developer.
When it comes to Java, Collection framework provides a well-abstracted way to sort objects. They donâ€™t have to implement a sorting algorithm whenever they want to sort some objects
